bwwExcerpt: On the other hand, for those who've grown tired of seeing powerful women forever portrayed as shrill and feuding divas in popular culture (see everything from Mariah Carey and Nicki Minaj on 'American Idol' to the new Bette Davis-Joan Crawford melodrama 'Feud') 'War Paint' attempts an alternative -- a portrait of competition between women that is nuanced, empathetic and maybe even exemplary.
